data.oai_dc:dc: Friesland is a province in the north of the Netherlands and has over 646,000 inhabitants. Its capital is Leeuwarden. Apart from Dutch, the Frisian language is also used as a language of administration. Its size, including 4 islands and the Waddenzee, covers 5,748 square kilometres.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl293,138 records (March 2018)
